title: Dhikr After Witr
description: Authentic supplications for Dhikr After Witr
seoContent: Authentic invocations and supplications for Dhikr After Witr. Derived from reliable sources including Hisnul Muslim.

items.title: Dua 119
items.arabic: ((سُبْحَانَ المَلِكِ القُدُّوسِ)) ثلاثَ مرَّاتٍ والثَّالِثَةُ يَجْهَرُ بها ويَمُدُّ بها صَوتَهُ يقولُ: [رَبِّ الْمَلاَئِكَةِ وَالرُّوحِ])).
items.transliteration: Subhanal-malikil-quddoos.(three times).on the third time he would raise his voice, elongate it and add: (Rabbil-mala-ikati warrooh.)
items.translation: How perfect The King, The Holy One is.(three times) on the third time he would raise his voice, elongate it and add: (Lord of the angles and the Rooh (i.e. Jibra-eel).)

description_ar: من الأذكار والأدعية الصحيحة: ذكر الوتر
